alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:28PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Geauga, Lake and northwestern Ashtabula Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1027 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Fairport Harbor to near Mentor to Lakeline. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Kirtland, Austinburg, North Perry, Thompson, Kirtland Hills, Rock Creek and Grand River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
